animal.question: I wag my tail and bark. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on these
🐾 I have four legs and am furry
🏡 I live in a house with you

animal.question: I say 'Moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in a field
⚫ I have black and white spots
🥛 You drink my milk with your cereal

animal.question: I meow and chase mice. I like to purr. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn
🐈 I like to sleep in boxes
🐾 I have sharp claws

animal.question: I waddle and quack. I swim in a pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have a flat bill
💦 I like to swim in water
🐥 My babies are fluffy and yellow

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts
🐘 I am very big and grey
🚿 I use my trunk to spray water

animal.question: I have a mane and roar. I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am a very powerful animal
🦁 Male version of me has a mane
🥩 I eat meat

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. I love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 I am often white or brown
🥕 I have big teeth for eating carrots
🌷 I like to hide in gardens

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I like to make funny faces
🌴 I live in the jungle
🍌 I peel and eat this yellow fruit

animal.question: I slither on the ground and hiss. I don't have legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I can be green, brown, or other colors
🥚 I hatch from an egg
🐭 I might eat small animals like mice

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. I look like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes help me hide in tall grass
💨 I can run very fast
🌿 I eat grass and plants

ocean.question: I'm big and blue, and boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 Fish swim in me.
🌊 I have waves.
🚢 Big ships travel on me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am very, very slow.
🏡 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have many arms!
🎨 I can change colors.
🌊 I squirt ink when scared.

ocean.question: I'm a big fish with very sharp teeth! What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I have fins.
🦷 My bite is very strong.
🌊 I'm sometimes called 'Jaws'.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am often many colours.
🏠 I live in a reef.
🪸 Reefs are home to me and many other fishes

ocean.question: I'm very big and sing a song. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am bigger than a boat!
🌊 I live in the ocean and I'm a mammal
🎶 People can hear my songs across long distances

ocean.question: I look like a star and live on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have pointy arms.
🖐 I have five arms.
✨ I'm often found in tide pools.

ocean.question: I have a long, pointy nose and swim in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I am very smart.
💨 I breathe through a blowhole.
🌊 I love to jump out of the water.

ocean.question: I am a very big crab with powerful claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I am a kind of crab
🇯🇵 I'm named after a country.
🦞 My claws can pinch very hard!

ocean.question: I'm a tiny creature that glows in the dark in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I make the ocean sparkle!
🔬 You need a microscope to see me well.
💡 Some say I create a 'milky sea'.
